description: This is a dashboard to display Thailand air quality.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT L.latitude AS lat,L.longitude AS lng,AVG(T.AQI) AS avg_AQI
FROM Thailand T
JOIN 
    Location L ON T.location_id = L.location_id
WHERE L.region = 'Thailand'
    AND $__timeFilter(T.recorded_at)
GROUP BY L.location_id, L.latitude, L.longitude;

panels.title: Average AQI for PM2.5 by Station

targets.rawSql:
SELECT pm25, pm10, no2, o3, so2, co, recorded_at 
FROM air_quality.Thailand 
WHERE location_id = 225629

options.content:
Average Pollutants by Station:
1) Bangkok(MA): Nonthaburi, 2) North: Chiangrai, 3) Northeast: Sakon Nakhon, 4) East: Chanthaburi, 5) South: Trang, 6) West: Prachuap Khiri Khan

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AQI, recorded_at 
FROM air_quality.Thailand
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)

SELECT pm25, pm10, no2, o3, so2, co, recorded_at 
FROM air_quality.Thailand 
WHERE location_id = 353740

SELECT L.location_city, T.avg_AQI
FROM (
    SELECT location_id, AVG(AQI) AS avg_AQI
    FROM Thailand
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
    GROUP BY location_id
) AS T
JOIN 
    Location AS L ON T.location_id = L.location_id
ORDER BY T.avg_AQI DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT L.location_city, T.avg_AQI
FROM (
    SELECT location_id, AVG(AQI) AS avg_AQI
    FROM Thailand
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
    GROUP BY location_id
) AS T
JOIN
    Location AS L ON T.location_id = L.location_id
ORDER BY T.avg_AQI ASC
LIMIT 1;

FROM air_quality.Thailand 
WHERE location_id = 225567
